algs4

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • algs4.Counter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Counter>

    public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Counter>
    Compilation: javac Counter.java Execution: java Counter N T Dependencies: StdRandom.java StdOut.java A mutable data type for an integer counter. The test clients create N counters and performs T increment operations on random counters. % java Counter 6 600000 0: 99870 1: 99948 2: 99738 3: 100283 4: 100185 5: 99976
